description: This document presents summary information on the quality of health care received by Medicare beneficiaries, including information about their experiences as patients obtaining care. This quality of care data is presented at the national level, and is shown for different racial-ethnic groups.The specific measures reported fall into two categories (1) patient experience measures and (2) clinical care measures. This information may be of interest to Medicare beneficiaries, Medicare Advantage and prescription drug plans, and others interested in better understanding beneficiaries quality of care and how it differs across racial-ethnic groups.
keyword: Health Employer Data and Information Set (HEDIS)
title: Racial and Ethnic Disparities in MA
